column4: Hello all! How may I convince RhythmBox to open a music CD disc image that I made using Disc Copier? (The image produced includes a TOC file)
if its a true image, simply mount it, then point rythmbox at the new mount.
I do not believe an Audio CD contains a Filesystem Image. I do not believe Linux mounts any filesystem as a predicate to playing an Audio CD (attn Jeruvy)
What filesystem type (as in the -t argument to mount) do you think an Audio CD might require?
